name: File Explorer
set.perf.desc: When enabled, animations are disabled to improve performance. The code snippet data-cookable="1" is disabled. The animation duration is set to 0s.
set.chunk.desc: This setting determines the size into which the file will be divided during upload.
set.path.desc: This setting determines which directory will be loaded at startup.
set.animtime.desc: This setting adjusts the duration of animations on the page.
set.lang.desc: This setting changes the language of the page.
